title: Lollipop Raosted Lamb Chops
directions: Rub chops with olive oil and then coat with spice mixture
Make sure lamb is at room temperature

Add remaining oil to a large oven proof frying pan and heat. When very hot add the lamb racks. Cook on each side for 3 minutes. Stand the racks up and put the frying pan in the oven . Heat for about 15 minutes or until a meat thermometer reads 125-145F for reare to medium rare.Set aside to rest for at least 15 minutes.
Cut chops and serve with raita
ingredients: 12 - 24 lamb chops (whole racks not individual chops)
